title: Your Money or Your Data: A Ransomware Story
itunes:title: Your Money or Your Data: A Ransomware Story
description:
What is ransomware and where did it come from? From an odd, chaotic campaign in 1989 to the present day, we look at the dangers of ransomware.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
